Tidy reducedDims data

Source: R/tidiers.R
tidy_dims.Rd

Tidy reducedDims data

tidy_dims(fsce, dimnames = NULL, dims = c(1, 2))

Arguments

fsce

An object of class FunctionalSingleCellExperiment.
dimnames

vector of dimnames to retrieve. If NULL, retrieve all dimnames.
dims

vector of dimensions to retrieve

Tidying

This is a data tidier for a FunctionalSingleCellExperiment. Returns data from SingleCellExperiment in a tidy format, where variables are columns and observations are rows.

If the FunctionalSingleCellExperiment contains more than one SingleCellExperiment, data from each sce are joined using the cell_id variable name, and a new experiment column contains the name of the source sce.

See also

Other tidiers: tidy_all, tidy_coldata, tidy_counts, tidy_logcounts

Examples

tidy_dims(fsce_small)
#> # A tibble: 250 x 8
#>    experiment cell_id            PCA1   PCA2  UMAP1  UMAP2 TSNE1  TSNE2
#>    <chr>      <chr>             <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>
#>  1 rnaseq     TGCGGGTGTAGAGTGC  4.39   0.465  1.91   0.843 11.8    4.73
#>  2 rnaseq     TGGTTCCCATCTATGG -5.96  -5.51  -4.01   0.781 -8.65   7.38
#>  3 rnaseq     CATATTCCACGTCAGC -1.28   2.43   2.50  -0.741  6.75   2.09
#>  4 rnaseq     TCACAAGTCCTGCTTG 17.3    0.547  0.891 -8.86   3.49 -22.3 
#>  5 rnaseq     GGAATAATCCAGGGCT -4.74  -0.112 -2.52   3.65  -8.28   2.34
#>  6 rnaseq     CTTGGCTGTTGATTGC 20.3   -1.26   0.606 -8.65   5.15 -25.2 
#>  7 rnaseq     GTGAAGGTCTTTCCTC -5.32  -5.36  -3.53   2.93  -6.26   4.87
#>  8 rnaseq     AGCGGTCAGTAGCCGA -5.30  -4.87  -1.70   1.16  -2.30   6.38
#>  9 rnaseq     GGATGTTTCATGTGGT  0.848 13.3    7.48   5.61  -5.06  -4.95
#> 10 rnaseq     GTACTCCGTAATCACC -5.77  -4.64  -2.30   1.47  -3.17   9.80
#> # … with 240 more rows

tidy_dims(fsce_small, dimnames = c("UMAP"))
#> # A tibble: 250 x 4
#>    experiment cell_id           UMAP1  UMAP2
#>    <chr>      <chr>             <dbl>  <dbl>
#>  1 rnaseq     TGCGGGTGTAGAGTGC  1.91   0.843
#>  2 rnaseq     TGGTTCCCATCTATGG -4.01   0.781
#>  3 rnaseq     CATATTCCACGTCAGC  2.50  -0.741
#>  4 rnaseq     TCACAAGTCCTGCTTG  0.891 -8.86 
#>  5 rnaseq     GGAATAATCCAGGGCT -2.52   3.65 
#>  6 rnaseq     CTTGGCTGTTGATTGC  0.606 -8.65 
#>  7 rnaseq     GTGAAGGTCTTTCCTC -3.53   2.93 
#>  8 rnaseq     AGCGGTCAGTAGCCGA -1.70   1.16 
#>  9 rnaseq     GGATGTTTCATGTGGT  7.48   5.61 
#> 10 rnaseq     GTACTCCGTAATCACC -2.30   1.47 
#> # … with 240 more rows
